name: Soulsmith
description:
In this game, you are a ghost trying to fight your way through the underworld. You descend deeper and deeper into the underworld to find the portal that will return you to life. 

This game was made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 48 Jam.

DISCLAIMER:

Though we included Mac And Linux builds they are untested and possibly unstable.

Credits:

Dark Blue Dragon Games
